content: this is a big puppy standing about 20 inches tall if you use the same yarn and hook size given in the supplies list this pattern will be difficult to do if you use a cotton yarn i strongly recommend an acrylic however if you want to try it in miniature than a cotton will work fine this pattern requires a tighter gauge when decreasing the neck area and last few row of the body especially if you stuff it enough so an acrylic will be much easier on your hands supplies list given in the written pattern 1 there is a full video tutorial for assembly broken into shorter videos to make it easier for the viewer to find what they need for the first time i have closed captions available turn those off and on yourself also i have enable the option for viewers to contribute captions for my older videos see the list of video available for this here 2 pick up the written pattern here 3 view the assembly post with lots of photos and videos here 4 the miniature puppy is also a free pattern here 5 1 http //www amigurumitogo com/2017/06/crochet-dog-free-pattern html 2 http //www youtube com/timedtext_cs_panel tab=2&c=ucdadg8ln0v4mlmxicxaw0pg 3 http //www amigurumitogo com/2017/06/crochet-dog-free-pattern html 4 http //www amigurumitogo com/2017/06/cuddle-me-puppy-assembly-instructions html 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/miniature-puppy
